info.name: RocketChat Dark Theme
info.description:
A dark theme for the DNum RocketChat in University of Strasbourg
Still a work in progress, tell me if you find a problem!
info.additionalInfo:
Version: v1.1.2
RocketChat Latest Version Supported: v0.65.1

Based on: https://userstyles.org/styles/133150/rocketchat-dark
From: JakeBathman

What's new?
-fixed some styles
-fancy emojis
-highlighted mentions

credit: <url>https://userstyles.org/styles/133150/rocketchat-dark</url>
